ovdesc.p: This file holds the records which are used by the archiving system to initialise the tape drive prior to a spool to tape of archived file contents.
Each record defines the tape unit to be assigned to the archives spool process and the logical tape number to be used.

There is no time out for this process. Errors which may occur if the device is already assigned to another user are displayed on the screen in on-line mode or reported from within the batch end of day process. The initialise tape process must be run prior to a spool to tape of archived records.

desc.p: A maximum of 4 characters may be entered.
Keys to archives init tape are descriptively named according to the tape drive they initialise.
Specifies the logical tape number to be assigned to the tape.
Specifies the tape drive unit number to be assigned to the spool process.
